requestedBy.value: function process(data) { if(data['REQUESTED_BY']) { var req = data['REQUESTED_BY'].toUpperCase(); if(['REQUEST_BY_UNKNOWN', 'CUSTOMER', 'POWER_OF_ATTORNEY', 'CREDITOR', 'DEBT_CONSOLIDATOR', 'ATTORNEY', 'TRUEACCORD', 'ATTORNEY_DEBT_CONSOLIDATOR'].includes(req)) return req; } return 'REQUEST_BY_UNKNOWN'; }

communicationType.value: function process(data) { if(data['COMMUNICATION_TYPE']) { var type = data['COMMUNICATION_TYPE'].toUpperCase(); if(['COMMUNICATION_TYPE_UNKNOWN', 'WRITTEN', 'VERBAL'].includes(type)) return type; } return 'COMMUNICATION_TYPE_UNKNOWN'; }

receivedPowerOfAttorneyDocumentation.value: function process(data) { if (data['RECEIVED_POA_DOCS']) { return data['RECEIVED_POA_DOCS'] === 'Y' || data['RECEIVED_POA_DOCS'] === 'true'; } return false; }
